title: The Future I'm Given
description: Emily chose a mortal life, giving up immortality and enhanced strength and abilities for a husband and child. She preferred a normal life time with a loving family to a lonely eternity. But fate had other plans, giving her only a year and-a-half. As she lies mortally wounded, the man who saved her from death once before and became the father of her child now fights to save her again. He will be forced to collaborate with an old enemy and betray business partners who have been loyal to him.His only hope is a dangerous long shot. He drives himself almost to the point of exhaustion even as he deals with the pain of loss and struggles to take care of their infant daughter. He is assisted in his impossible quest by the woman his wife thought of as a sister and her family. He will do what ever it takes to bring back the mother of his daughter, the center of his universe. He is determined to give her a future.
author: Guy B Wheatley
